description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              After sales management by following up on orders/ restaurants to ensure the quantity & quality of orders, ensure the satisfaction of restaurants; maintain & develop the win-win relationship between the company & restaurants:
              

              ●	Maintain & develop relationship of the company’s top 300 restaurants
              
              ●	Co- operate with Sales & Marketing to design & execute the co-operated promotions/programs between the company & partners (restaurants) to increase quality & quantity of orders.
              
              ●	Study & provide solutions to reopen the temporary & offline pending restaurants & to reduce the quantity of offline pending restaurants
              
              ●	Enhance large brands to do discounts on the company’s website
              
              ●	Regularly follow with restaurants about store expansions
              
              ●	Promotion product distribution
              
              ●	Ensure order targets of months, quarters, years.
              
              ●	Manage, train & assign tasks to the staffs of Business development Team
              
              ●	Monitor the team’s performance, motivate them to reach targets.
              
              ●	Report to Sales Manager
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              ●	Top priority: Experiences in e-commerce company or in food & beverage industry is a BIG advantage
              
              ●	Bachelor (or above) degree in Business/ Management / marketing or equivalent
              
              ●	Minimum 5 years experience (including at least 2 years of leader/ supervisor) in business development, partnerships, sales, marketing or equivalent role
              
              ●	Excellent communication skills in both written and spoken English and Vietnamese
              
              ●	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to identify and provide comprehensive solutions for varying customer needs
              
              ●	Good sense of business
              
              ●	Good in communication, problem solving
              
              ●	Strong leadership, management and motivational abilities
              
              ●	Good at working independently or teamwork
              
              ●	Able to work under high pressure
              



              ** WHAT WE CAN OFFER?
              

              ●	Monthly income from 18 VND Million - 24 VND Million (depend on ability & experience) + Bonus
              
              ●	Insurances according to Vietnam labor code and company policies
              
              ●	Year-end bonus, public holidays bonus, birthday bonus
              
              ●	Yearly salary increasing
              
              ●	Annual healthcare and yearly traveling
              
              ●	Opportunity to be trained & worked in a leading e-commerce company in food/beverage in Viet Nam
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
